DOC.criteria: Continuous ambulatory peritoneal dialysis patient whose primary disease chronic glomerulonephritis , The range age 20 65 year old . serum albumin level ≥ 35 g/L . Residual GFR ≥ 2 ml/min/1.73 m2 . 500 ml/d ≤ urine output ≤ 1000 ml/d . Subjects agree participate study sign inform consent . Patients secondary nephropathy . Patients congestive heart failure , angina , myocardial infarction , severe valvular heart disease , malignant hypertension , hypertensive encephalopathy cerebrovascular accident . Patients chronic liver disease , dyscrasia , psychiatric disorder , alcohol drug abuse .
